name: T4Database
short_description:
The aim is the project is to create a new method of bridging the gap between database schema to .NET classes.
Current methods such as DataSets, Entity Framework, LINQ to SQL etc. all have their cons and pros, which I'll detail in the Wiki pages

T4 templates are a Microsoft tool to generate code during compilation. 
This provide method to run code at compile time that queries the DB schema and creates matching class and methods. 
Thus changes to DB schema can be reflected to .NET code by simply recompiling the project, instead of manually changing the code.
summary: T4 template files to bridge database schema to .NET classes
